divs: Sighting DetailsAs a amateur stargazer, I'm pretty familiar with the night sky. I was actually scanning the sky for passing satellites. Looking toward the eastern sky, at first I saw three orange triangles moving across from east to west. No sound or any movement variation between the three lights. As I watched them fly above, the triangular lights were brighter toward their centers. As the lights were overhead, you could see a structure holding them together. It appeared to be transparent like a cloak. Planes were also in the area passing that appeared the size of ticks compared to the size craft. As I moved to get a better view, everything disappeared.
